text: The University of Kashmir (also known as Kashmir University and abbreviated as KU) is a university located in Srinagar, in the Indian Union territory of Jammu and Kashmir. Talat Ahmad was appointed as the Vice Chancelor of the KU in August 2018. ==References== Category:1940s establishments in India Category:1948 establishments in Asia Category:Colleges and universities in India Category:Jammu and Kashmir
title: University of Kashmir
